it.polimi.ingsw.network.server

Interface ServerInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    NetworkHandler
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RMIServer, SocketServer

    public interface ServerInterface
extends NetworkHandler
    Server Class interface: declare the methods used by Server and Lobby to handle, via RMI/Socket, the clients requests

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      shut-down the server

        Event disconnectClient(java.lang.String user)
        handle the client, identified by user, disconnection from the server implementation
        Parameters:
        user - is the disconnecting client's username
        Returns:
        a DisconnectedEvent
